channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- WebDAV Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- WebDAV Server

item.title: CVE-2022-22685|2024-09-17T01:56:25.485Z -- synology -- webdav%20server
item.description: Improper limitation of a pathname to a restricted directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in webapi component in Synology WebDAV Server before 2.4.0-0062 allows remote authenticated users to delete arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.
